channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 随着本周末奥斯卡颁奖典礼红地毯筹备工作的开始，@AFP 目前的一些报道：◾ 奥本海默会胜过他们所有人吗？◾奥斯卡制片人分享晚会愿景 ◾提名名单
item.description:
As work begins on the red carpet ahead of this weekend's Academy Awards, some of @AFP's coverage so far:

◾ Will Oppenheimer outshine them all? https://t.co/yGi5CPuZbo

◾ Oscars producers share vision for gala https://t.co/MW1HA5JjGD

◾ The nominees https://t.co/ylTncEJPmM pic.twitter.com/A0hCtB2e6u

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 法新社记者 @saulloeb 拍摄的第一夫人吉尔-拜登在等待时的精彩照片，拜登总统在前往海军陆战队一号的途中花了 10 多分钟在绳索线上工作
item.description:
Great pic of First Lady Jill Biden waiting while President Biden spends over 10 minutes working the rope line en route to Marine One, by AFP’s @saulloeb pic.twitter.com/cBIsSOeCxn

— Danny Kemp (@dannyctkemp) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在两家公司的争执考验了欧洲大陆管理大型科技公司的新法律之后，苹果公司周五改变了方针，将允许 Epic Games 为 iPhone 开发一个相互竞争的欧洲应用程序商店 ⬇️
item.description:
Apple reversed course on Friday and will allow Epic Games to develop a competing European app store for iPhones, after a feud between the two companies tested a new law governing big tech on the continent ⬇️https://t.co/FsgUCRxYS3

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 美国制药巨头礼来公司周五表示，该公司备受期待的阿尔茨海默氏症药物将暂缓通过监管机构的进一步审查，这对患有这种毁灭性脑部疾病的患者来说是一个打击 ⬇️。
item.description:
Eli Lilly's highly anticipated Alzheimer's drug has been held back for further review by regulators, the US pharmaceutical giant said Friday, in a blow for patients with the devastating brain disorder ⬇️https://t.co/XUPIA0MMzc

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 一场前所未有的妇女动员活动使一个自由派联盟在波兰上台执政，为欧洲最严格的堕胎法之一被废除带来了希望。但现在她们感到被背叛了 ⬇️
item.description:
An unprecedented mobilisation among women brought a liberal alliance to power in Poland, raising hopes that one of Europe's strictest abortion laws would be scrapped.

But now they feel betrayed ⬇️https://t.co/QuIfZ4sioO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 据美国媒体周五报道，奥斯卡获奖女演员娜塔莉-波特曼（Natalie Portman）已与她的法国舞蹈编导丈夫离婚，⬇️。
item.description:
Oscar-winning actress Natalie Portman has divorced her French choreographer husband, US media reported Friday ⬇️https://t.co/WUmYLMzmHz pic.twitter.com/cIygyGX8zq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 共和党全国委员会周五选举唐纳德-特朗普的盟友（包括他的儿媳）担任最高领导职务，从而在 11 月大选前加强了这位前总统对该党的控制 ⬇️
item.description:
The Republican National Committee elected Donald Trump allies, including his daughter-in-law, to top leadership positions on Friday, tightening the former president's grip over the party ahead of the November election ⬇️https://t.co/nkrplEucYl

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 周五的官方数据显示，2023-24 年冬季是美国本土有记录以来最温暖的季节，这是气候危机导致世界进入前所未有的领域的最新迹象 ⬇️
item.description:
The 2023–24 winter season was the warmest ever recorded for the mainland United States, official data showed Friday, in the latest sign the world is moving into unprecedented territory as a result of the climate crisis ⬇️https://t.co/yoRjDkDGQ3

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 美国总统拜登（Joe Biden）周五在一系列关键的摇摆州发表了国情咨文演讲，对竞争对手唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）进行了猛烈抨击，受到好评⬇️。
item.description:
US President Joe Biden took his reelection message to a raft of key swing states Friday, buoyed by a combative, well-received State of the Union address that savaged rival Donald Trump ⬇️https://t.co/xryNxPfpIP

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: #更新 比特币周五再创新高，首次突破 7 万美元，原因是投资者对美国何时开始降息的猜测不断升温 ➡️
item.description:
#UPDATE Bitcoin hit another record high on Friday, smashing through $70,000 for the first time on growing investor demand amid speculation over when the United States may begin lowering interest rates ➡️ https://t.co/5HS4Ll64bj pic.twitter.com/bjcTw17gXg

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: #最新消息 加沙最大医院的一名医护人员周五称，巴勒斯坦领土北部的一次人道主义空投造成五人死亡，十人受伤 ⬇️
item.description:
#UPDATE A medic at Gaza's largest hospital said on Friday a humanitarian airdrop in the north of the Palestinian territory killed five people and wounded 10 ⬇️ https://t.co/vcpA6ACtbn

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: @AFP摄影师奥利维耶-莫林（Olivier Morin）在挪威罗弗敦群岛的梅尔沃尔（Maervoll）拍摄到北极光（Aurora Borealis）。
item.description:
Glowing skies.@AFP photographer Olivier Morin captures the northern lights (Aurora Borealis) in Maervoll on Norway's Lofoten Islands

The natural illuminations are caused by interactions between solar winds and the Earth's magnetic field pic.twitter.com/G7p2MwY20D

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班周五前往佛罗里达州会见他的 "好朋友 "美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普，他是 2024 年共和党总统候选人提名的热门人选 ➡️
item.description:
Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban travels to Florida on Friday to meet his "good friend" former US president Donald Trump, the shoo-in for the 2024 Republican presidential nomination ➡️ https://t.co/oC3KO4x8Mw pic.twitter.com/q8le5uefGG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: #最新消息：周五，国际社会加紧努力，通过海路向加沙运送急需的人道主义救援物资，以应对以色列在打击哈马斯武装分子时对陆路通行的限制。⬇️。
item.description:
#UPDATE An international effort gathered pace on Friday to get desperately needed humanitarian relief into Gaza by sea, in the latest bid to counter overland access restrictions blamed on Israel as it battles Hamas militants ⬇️ https://t.co/6NmO7Oq1cN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 尼日利亚总统博拉-艾哈迈德-蒂努布（Bola Ahmed Tinubu）周五派遣军队营救了被枪手从该国西北部一所学校绑架的 250 多名学生，这是三年来最大规模的大规模绑架事件之一 ⬇️。
item.description:
Nigeria's President Bola Ahmed Tinubu on Friday sent troops to rescue more than 250 pupils kidnapped by gunmen from a school in the country's northwest in one of the largest mass abductions in three years ⬇️ https://t.co/k2CgFNLmzQ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: #比特币再创新高，突破 7 万美元大关
item.description:
#BREAKING Bitcoin hits another record high above $70,000 mark pic.twitter.com/7c1ApbDAgG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: #BREAKING#加沙医院军医称北部空投援助物资造成五人死亡，十人受伤
item.description:
#BREAKING Gaza hospital medic says aid airdrop in north killed five, wounded 10 pic.twitter.com/H82o7vH86j

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 苏格兰队副队长罗里-达奇（Rory Darge）表示，苏格兰队并不关注杜汉-范德梅尔韦（Duhan Van Der Merwe）在周六对阵意大利队的比赛中打破斯图尔特-霍格（Stuart Hogg）的尝试纪录，因为他们正着眼于可能的首个 #SixNations 冠军头衔 ➡️ #AFPSports #ITAvSCO
item.description:
Scotland co-captain Rory Darge says his side are not focusing on Duhan Van Der Merwe's bid to break Stuart Hogg's try record against Italy on Saturday as they eye a possible first #SixNations title ➡️ https://t.co/Rf96QuD1nK #AFPSports #ITAvSCO pic.twitter.com/YKSBnLsL13

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇮🇱 数千人在以色列超新星音乐节纪念碑前悼念游客纷纷涌向音乐节现场，悼念在 10 月 7 日的袭击中被哈马斯杀害的 364 人。
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇮🇱 Thousands pay respects at Israel's Supernova festival memorial

Visitors have been flocking to the site of the music festival to pay their respects to the 364 people killed there by Hamas in the 7 October attacks.

📹 Edrien ESTEVES
📸 @menahemkahana#AFPVertical pic.twitter.com/JfDr5Z9DbC

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 这是我们今天争分夺秒整理出来的四五篇关于 #DragonBall 及其创作者的报道之一（我们已经数不清做了多少篇了！）。鸟山明逝世，他一丝不苟的艺术创作和对 "正统 "娱乐的精通为漫画设定了标准 @AFP
item.description:
This is one of the four or five stories on #DragonBall & its creator we scrambled to put together (lost count of how many we did!) today. RIP Akira Toriyama, whose meticulous artwork & knack for "shonen" entertainment set the standard for manga @AFP
https://t.co/4RZdq96Iqj

— Tomohiro Osaki (@TomohiroOsaki) March 8, 2024

item.title: 安迪-法瑞尔（Andy Farrell）坚称，尽管周六在特威克纳姆（Twickenham）举行的六国赛（#SixNations）中，客队将以压倒性优势获胜，但他的祖国英格兰队仍有能力击败爱尔兰队，连续捧起大满贯奖杯 ➡️ @stGuyer #AFPSports #ENGvIRE
item.description:
Andy Farrell has insisted his native England remain capable of scuppering Ireland's bid for successive Grand Slams even though the visitors will be overwhelming favourites to win Saturday's #SixNations clash at Twickenham ➡️ https://t.co/x7thl185tj @stGuyer #AFPSports #ENGvIRE pic.twitter.com/BZ8GDcY63K

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 日本极具人气和影响力的《龙珠》漫画和动画片的创作者鸟山明去世，享年 68 岁，他的制作团队周五表示 ➡️。
item.description:
The creator of Japan's hugely popular and influential "Dragon Ball" comics and anime cartoons, Akira Toriyama, has died aged 68, his production team said on Friday ➡️ https://t.co/LnUCU7QHRy pic.twitter.com/SemjWraWjL

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 日本极具人气和影响力的《龙珠》漫画和动画片的创作者鸟山明去世，享年 68 岁，他的制作团队周五表示 ⬇️。
item.description:
The creator of Japan's hugely popular and influential "Dragon Ball" comics and anime cartoons, Akira Toriyama, has died aged 68, his production team said on Friday ⬇️ https://t.co/LnUCU7QHRy

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: #最新消息 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙周五表示，堕胎权目前受到法国宪法的保护，这在世界上尚属首例，在欧盟权利宪章和全球范围内得到保障之前，法国不会罢休 ⬇️。
item.description:
#UPDATE French President Emmanuel Macron on Friday said France would not rest until the right to abortion, now protected by the French constitution in a world first, was guaranteed in the EU's rights charter and around the globe ⬇️ https://t.co/A769JKezmK

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: #AFP 本周图片（3 月 02-08 日）
item.description:
#AFP PICTURES OF THE WEEK (March 02-08)https://t.co/YVWtZbUJ3M pic.twitter.com/iCp59FTjnb

— AFP Photo (@AFPphoto) March 8, 2024

item.title: 南非格莱美获奖艺人泰拉（Tyla）因伤取消了她期待已久的世界巡演，而这距离巡演开始仅有几周时间。
item.description:
South Africa's Grammy-winning artist Tyla has cancelled her much-anticipated world tour just weeks before it was start due to an injury.https://t.co/c7wgGL8JFJ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 🏏 队长罗希特-夏尔马（Rohit Sharma）和舒伯曼-吉尔（Shubman Gill）的世纪进球帮助印度在达兰萨拉以 255 分的领先优势牢牢控制了对英格兰的最后一场测试 #AFPSports #INDvENG
item.description:
🏏 Centuries from skipper Rohit Sharma and Shubman Gill helped India entrench their control of the final Test against England in Dharamsala with a 255-run lead on Fridayhttps://t.co/3IB3RajIat #AFPSports #INDvENG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 欧盟委员会主席乌苏拉-冯德莱恩（Ursula von der Leyen）周五表示，在人们担心饱受战争蹂躏的巴勒斯坦领土会发生饥荒之际，希望从塞浦路斯通往加沙的人道主义援助通道能在本周末开通。
item.description:
European Commission chief Ursula von der Leyen expressed hopes Friday that a humanitarian aid corridor from Cyprus to Gaza will open this weekend, amid fears of famine in the war-torn Palestinian territory.https://t.co/YFVQMOY3I9

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: #最新消息 法拉利车队周五宣布，西班牙车手卡洛斯-塞恩斯（Carlos Sainz）因阑尾炎退出本周末的沙特阿拉伯大奖赛，18 岁的英国后备车手奥利弗-比尔曼（Oliver Bearman）将顶替他的位置。
item.description:
#UPDATE Spain's Carlos Sainz has been ruled out of the Saudi Arabia Grand Prix this weekend with appendicitis with 18-year-old British reserve driver Oliver Bearman taking his place, the Ferrari team announced Friday.#AFPSports https://t.co/G3XRccRiP1

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 视频：在玻利维亚的埃尔阿尔托市，一群以土著艾马拉妇女为主的妇女正在学习自卫术。政府数据显示，在玻利维亚，每 10 名妇女中就有 8 人一生中至少遭受过一次暴力侵害，因此 "瓦尔米力量 "项目拥有一批忠实的粉丝。
item.description:
VIDEO: In the Bolivian city of El Alto, a group of predominantly indigenous Aymara women are learning self-defense. In a country where government data shows that eight in 10 women experience violence at least once in their lives, the "Warmi Power" project has a keen fanbase. pic.twitter.com/fVCeR7JiWi

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024
